Spring.Utils Namespace

Summary

This namespace provides many well-encapsulated utility classes and routines about the environment and system.

Classes
 NameDescription
EDriveNotFoundException

Represents type EDriveNotFoundException.

TCallback

Adapts class instance (object) method as standard callback function.

TInterfacedThread

Provides an abstract class base of TThread that implements the IInterface.

TOperatingSystem

Represents information about the operating system.

TStringMatchers

Provides static methods to create various string predicates.

Top
Records
 NameDescription
TEnvironment

Provides information about, and means to manipulate, the current environment.

TFileVersionInfo

Provides version information for a physical file on disk.

TVersion

Represents a version number in the format of "major.minor[.build[.revision]]", which is different from the delphi style format "major.minor[.release[.build]]".

Top
Enumerations
 NameDescription
TEnvironmentVariableTarget

Specifies the location where an environment variable is stored or retrieved in a set or get operation.

TOSPlatformType

Represents type TOSPlatformType.

TOSProductType

Represents type TOSProductType.

TOSSuiteType

Represents type TOSSuiteType.

TOSVersionType

Represents type TOSVersionType.

TProcessorArchitecture

Identifies the processor and bits-per-word of the platform targeted by an executable.

TSpecialFolder

Specifies enumerated constants used to retrieve directory paths to system special folders.

Represents an alias of the SysUtils type.

Represents an alias of the SysUtils type.

Environment

Represents a type alias of TEnvironment class.

PInstruction

Represents a pointer type to TInstruction.

TCallbackFunc

Defines an anonymous function which returns a callback pointer.

TEnum

Represents an alias of the TEnum type.

TInstruction

Represents an array of the Byte type.

Top
Routines
 NameDescription
ApplicationPath

Returns the path of the application.

ApplicationVersion

Returns the version number of the application.

ApplicationVersionString

Returns the version information of the application.

CheckDirectoryExists(string)

Determines whether a specified directory exists. An EDirectoryNotFoundException exception will be raised when not found.

CheckFileExists(string)

Determines whether a specified file exists. An EFileNotFoundException exception will be raised when not found.

ConvertDateTimeToFileTime(TDateTime,Boolean)

Overloaded. Converts a Delphi TDatetime value to a Windows TFiletime value.

ConvertFileTimeToDateTime(TFileTime,Boolean)

Overloaded. Converts a Windows TFiletime value to a Delphi TDatetime value. Not implemented on Mac as the Delphi POSIX version is time_t based, but only contains a date portion.

CreateCallback(TObject,Pointer)

Creates a standard callback function which was adapted from a instance method.

GetLastErrorMessage

Returns the last system error message.

IsAltPressed

Returns True if the Alt key is pressed, otherwise false.

IsCtrlPressed

Returns True if the Control key is pressed, otherwise false.

IsShiftPressed

Returns True if the Shift key is pressed, otherwise false.

Lock(IInterface,TProc)

Overloaded. Represents method Lock(IInterface,TProc).

Lock(TObject,TProc)

Overloaded. Obtains a mutual-exclusion lock for the given object, executes a procedure and then releases the lock.

ParseDateTime(string,string)

Represents method ParseDateTime(string,string).

Queue(TThreadProcedure)

Asynchronously executes a method call within the main thread.

Synchronize(TThreadProcedure)

Executes a method call within the main thread.

TryGetAccessToken(THandle)

Represents method TryGetAccessToken(THandle).

TryGetPropInfo(TObject,string,PPropInfo)

Try getting property information of an object.

TryParseDateTime(string,string,TDateTime)

Represents method TryParseDateTime(string,string,TDateTime).

UpdateStrings(TStrings,TProc)

Updates an instance of Classes|TStrings by calling its BeginUpdate and EndUpdate.
